mapper.insert: insert into house (house_name, house_build_year, house_sido_code, house_sido_name, house_gugun_code,house_gugun_name, house_dong_code , house_dong_name , house_jibun, house_lat, house_lng, code ) values (#{houseName},#{houseBuildYear}, #{houseSidoCode}, #{houseSidoName}, #{houseGugunCode},#{houseGugunName}, #{houseDongCode},#{houseDongName}, #{houseJibun},#{houseLat},#{houseLng}, #{code} )

insert into deal (house_id, deal_price, deal_deposit, deal_floor, deal_area, code, deal_content, user_id) values (#{houseId},#{dealPrice}, #{dealDeposit}, #{dealFloor}, #{dealArea}, #{code}, #{dealContent}, #{userId})
insert into deal_file (deal_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_url, file_reg_dt) values(#{dealId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl}, now())
mapper.select:
select * from house
where house_dong_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or house_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select file_url from deal_file where deal_id = #{dealId}
select * from house where house_id = (select house_id from deal where deal_id = #{dealId})

select house_id, house_name, house_build_year, house_sido_code, house_sido_name, house_gugun_code, house_gugun_name, house_dong_code, house_dong_name, house_jibun,code, house_lat, house_lng from house where house_dong_code = #{dongCode}

select house_id, house_name, house_build_year, house_sido_code, house_sido_name, house_gugun_code, house_gugun_name, house_dong_code, house_dong_name, house_jibun, code, house_lat, house_lng from house where house_name like concat("%", #{keyword}, "%")

select r.review_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_reg_dt, r.review_content, r.review_trafic_rating, r.review_safety_rating, r.review_store_rating from review r, users u where u.user_id = r.user_id and house_id = #{houseId};
mapper.update: update house set house_name = #{houseName}, house_build_year = #{houseBuildYear}, house_dong_code = #{houseDongCode}, house_dong_name = #{houseDongName}, house_jibun = #{houseJibun}, house_lat = #{houseLat}, house_lng = #{houseLng}, house_gugun_code = #{houseGugunCode}, house_gugun_name = #{houseGugunName}, code = #{code}, house_sido_code = #{houseSidoCode}, house_sido_name = #{houseSidoName} where house_id = #{houseId}
update deal set deal_price = #{dealPrice}, deal_deposit = #{dealDeposit}, deal_floor = #{dealFloor}, deal_area = #{dealArea}, code = #{code}, deal_content = #{dealContent} where deal_id = #{dealId}
